fxInfo_citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: By ”question” we mean, for example, the power of summons through which the head of state or head of government could be forced to explain its policies or testify.
fxInfo_cross_coder_aggregation: Bayesian Item Response Theory Measurement Model
fxInfo_question: In practice, does the legislature routinely question executive branch officials?
fxInfo_scale: Dichotomous, converted to interval by the measurement model
name: v2lgqstexp, *_osp, *_ord
